title: Former national school in Leitrim in 'prime and picturesque' location for sale at just €75,000
text:
Former national school in Leitrim in ‘prime and picturesque’ location for sale at just €75,000
A former national school in County Leitrim situated at a “prime and picturesque” location has come on the market with a guide price of €75,000.
The former national school at Derrinwillin, Dowra is on the market with DM Auctions.
The building is currently laid out as one large open-plan room, extending to approximately 51sq.m. in total, while the site extends to circa 0.257 of an acre.
The description of the property reads, “It could be easily adapted to suit a range of uses, the building lends itself perfectly to either residential conversion or commercial development, subject to the necessary planning permissions.
"There is also strong potential to add a first floor, further increasing the usable space and overall value of the property.
"There is water on the site, electricity is close by and there is an old septic tank in need of upgrading.”
The property is situated in a “prime and picturesque location” with views of Lough Yugan, a branch of Lough Allen which is renowned for fishing.
There is also outstanding views of Sliabh an Iarainn Mountain and the surrounding countryside.
The building is located on the L4294 road close to the Dowra Village which is approximately 5km, Drumshanbo is 15km and Carrick on Shannon 28km.
The property is also close to Lough Allen and local facilities including a church, GAA Grounds, community centre, local pubs and shops.
DM Auctions said the property may be suitable to qualify for the Vacant Property Refurbishment Grant Scheme (subject to terms and conditions).
The property is available for viewing by appointment only. For more information, contact the office on 071 985 6444 or leitrim@dmauctions.ie.
